translations: n.猪；<非正式>猪猡，下流坯；难处理的事情，令人不快的东西

phrs.translation: v. 明珠暗投；对牛弹琴

sentences.sentence: I do not want to be one of the swines in your entourage.
sentences.translation: 我不想与您的随员中那些卑劣的家伙们为伍。

sentences.sentence: Methods:4 pairs of littermate swines were allocated randomly to 2 groups(the control group and the experimental group).
sentences.translation: 方法：选用同窝小猪4对，分别随机分为实验组和对照组。

sentences.sentence: Objective To study the genotype of swines isolated from humans and their relationships with hepatitis E virus (HEV) in the rural areas of southern China.
sentences.translation: 目的调查中国南方某农村地区戊型肝炎病毒（HEV）人株与猪株的相关性。
